heisig_chinese_memo: An important meeting must be attended no matter sun or rain (umbrella) or else your bosses will yell out of their mouths and grow devil horns.
Ru_trainchinese:
huì: (мод.глаг) мочь, уметь, знать; понимать, быть сильным в; указывает на высокую вероятность того, что что-то произойдет
huì: (сущ) встреча, конференция
huì: (графема) собираться вместе, встречаться; храмовая ярмарка; союз; главный город; возможность, шанс
kuài: (графема) производить учет, балансировать счет, рассчитывать
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: At the local company they have a very gory way of getting rid of incompetent personnel : they arrange a business meeting in a very special room where the walls are ... meeting. Not surprisingly the boss is never present at these meetings, he's the one who pushes the button that sets the walls in motion.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jiajin inscriptions from "合" from ◎, like using a lid to cover the utensils (Luo Zhenyu, Li Xiaoding, Zhu Fangpu, Shen Pei), the original meaning is conformity. " Mouth " is like a vessel for holding things, and " 𠓛 " is like the lid of a vessel, with the contents in the middle. "Shuowen": "Meeting, together. From Zeng from Zengsheng. Zeng, Yiye. All members of the meeting follow from the meeting. 㣛, the ancient Chinese will be like this."

The inscription may be added "彳", which means meeting on the road.

The incomplete oracle bone inscriptions are suspected to be the meaning of reunion, "Collection" 1030: "Meet me". Jinwen means meeting, Qiang Zhong: "When you enter the Great Wall, you will first meet in Pingyin." He also said that the accounting book for recording the sentenced prison lawsuits was taught: "It is to sue the brothers and officials at the meeting", which means that the result of this case will be recorded in the meeting book (Li Xueqin).

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period indicated meeting, "Guodian Slips. "Yu Cong Yi" Jian 36: "Therefore, he knows heaven and humanity." "Guodian Jane. "Yu Cong Yi" Jian 40: "Therefore, it will also contain the things of the ancient and the present." "Shangbo Bamboo Book II. "Rong Chengshi" Jane 9: "Able to be (in) between heaven and earth, and 㯱 (package) is (in) within the four seas." "Shangbo Bamboo Book II. "Rong Chengshi" Jane 19: "The benefit of the world" "Shangbo Bamboo Book II. "Rong Chengshi" Jane 52: "Yi Shao (Xiao) Hui Zhe (Zhu) Hou Zhi (teacher) in Muzhiye (Wild)". "Shangbo Bamboo Book Five. "Three Virtues" Jian 17: "When the wisdom (knowledge) is enough to flow (shun), the wisdom (knowledge) is enough to (educate) talents, and the wisdom (knowledge) is enough to become new (to be pro)." Tsinghua Jane II. "Lian Year" Jane 39: "Qin and Jin Yan will be good, work hard together." "Tsinghua Jane II. "The Year" Jane 61: "The Chuzhuang king was established for ten and four years, and the king met the princes in Li."
humanum_short_description_en: Jiajin inscriptions from "合" from ◎, like covering the utensils with a lid (Luo Zhenyu, Li Xiaoding, Zhu Fangpu, Shen Pei), the original meaning is the same.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「合」從◎，象用蓋子把盛有東西的器物蓋起來(羅振玉、李孝定、朱芳圃、沈培)，本義是相合。「口」象盛物的器皿，「𠓛」象器皿之蓋，中間是所盛載的東西。《說文》：「會，合也。从亼从曾省。曾，益也。凡會之屬皆从會。㣛，古文會如此。」

　　金文或加從「彳」，表示在道路上相會之意。

　　甲骨文辭殘，疑為會合之義，《合集》1030正：「會我」。金文表示會合，𠫑羌鐘：「入長城，先會于平陰」。又表示記錄所斷獄訟的計簿，訓匜：「乃以告吏兄、吏曶于會」，意即將此案件結果記入會簿之中(李學勤)。

　　戰國竹簡表示會合，《郭店簡．語叢一》簡36：「所以會天道人道也」。《郭店簡．語叢一》簡40：「所以會古含(今)之事也」。《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡9：「會才(在)天地之間，而㯱(包)才(在)四海之內」。《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡19：「會天地之利」。《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡52：「以少(宵)會者(諸)侯之帀(師)於牧之埜(野)」。《上博竹書五．三德》簡17：「智(知)天足以川(順)時，智(知)地足以由(育)材，智(知)人足以會新(親)。」又表示會盟，《清華簡二．繫年》簡39：「秦晉焉始會好，戮力同心。」《清華簡二．繫年》簡61：「楚莊王立十又四年，王會諸侯于厲。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「合」從◎，象用蓋子把盛有東西的器物蓋起來(羅振玉、李孝定、朱芳圃、沈培)，本義是相合。

會會RS
会会 		assemble, meet together, meeting, organization
  • RS. mouth 亼 above, mouth 曰 below, middle is mouth 曰 with possible rice in it: meeting over food

 合
(Simplified: 会)
Ideographic: People 人 speaking 日
  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • 亼 [ jí ] to assemble, to gather together
    • 日 [ rì ] sun; day; daytime
①聚合，合攏，合在一起：會合。會審。會話。
②多數人的集合或組成的團體：會議。開會。
③重要的或中心的城市：都會。省會。
④彼此見面：會面。會見。
⑤付錢：會賬。會鈔。
⑥理解，領悟，懂：會心，體會。
⑦能，善於：會游泳。會英語。
⑧時機，事情變化的一個時間：機會難得。
⑨一小段時間：一會兒。
⑩可能，能夠：他不會來了。
⑾恰巧碰上：會其怒。
⑿爲祭神而組織的活動：香會。
⒀應當，一定：長風破浪會有時。
⒁古同“繪”，五彩的刺繡。
會議 [ huì yì ]: meeting; conference; Classifiers: 场
①總計：會計(ａ．管理和計算財務的工作；b．管理和計算財務的人)。
②姓氏。

Chinese: An important meeting must be attended no matter sun or rain (umbrella) or else your bosses will yell out of their mouths and grow devil horns.
Meaning: meeting
Hanzi: 会
Story: At the local company they have a very gory way of getting rid of incompetent personnel : they arrange a business meeting in a very special room where the walls are ... meeting. Not surprisingly the boss is never present at these meetings, he's the one who pushes the button that sets the walls in motion.
Kind: traditional

甲金文從「 合 」從◎，象用蓋子把盛有東西的器物蓋起來(羅振玉、李孝定、朱芳圃、沈培)，本義是相合。「 口 」象盛物的器皿，「 𠓛 」象器皿之蓋，中間是所盛載的東西。《說文》：「會，合也。从亼从曾省。曾，益也。凡會之屬皆从會。㣛，古文會如此。」 金文或加從「 彳 」，表示在道路上相會之意。 甲骨文辭殘，疑為會合之義，《合集》1030正：「會我」。金文表示會合，𠫑羌鐘：「入長城，先會于平陰」。又表示記錄所斷獄訟的計簿，訓匜：「乃以告吏兄、吏曶于會」，意即將此案件結果記入會簿之中(李學勤)。 戰國竹簡表示會合，《郭店簡．語叢一》簡36：「所以會天道人道也」。《郭店簡．語叢一》簡40：「所以會古含(今)之事也」。《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡9：「會才(在)天地之間，而㯱(包)才(在)四海之內」。《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡19：「會天地之利」。《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡52：「以少(宵)會者(諸)侯之帀(師)於牧之埜(野)」。《上博竹書五．三德》簡17：「智(知)天足以川(順)時，智(知)地足以由(育)材，智(知)人足以會新(親)。」又表示會盟，《清華簡二．繫年》簡39：「秦晉焉始會好，戮力同心。」《清華簡二．繫年》簡61：「楚莊王立十又四年，王會諸侯于厲。」
Jiajin inscriptions from " 合" from ◎, like using a lid to cover the utensils (Luo Zhenyu, Li Xiaoding, Zhu Fangpu, Shen Pei), the original meaning is conformity. " Mouth" is like a vessel for holding things, and " 𠓛" is like the lid of a vessel, with the contents in the middle. "Shuowen": "Meeting, together. From Zeng from Zengsheng. Zeng, Yiye. All members of the meeting follow from the meeting. 㣛, the ancient Chinese will be like this." The inscription may be added " 彳", which means meeting on the road. The incomplete oracle bone inscriptions are suspected to be the meaning of reunion, "Collection" 1030: "Meet me". Jinwen means meeting, Qiang Zhong: "When you enter the Great Wall, you will first meet in Pingyin." He also said that the accounting book for recording the sentenced prison lawsuits was taught: "It is to sue the brothers and officials at the meeting", which means that the result of this case will be recorded in the meeting book (Li Xueqin). The bamboo slips of the Warring States period indicated meeting, "Guodian Slips. "Yu Cong Yi" Jian 36: "Therefore, he knows heaven and humanity." "Guodian Jane. "Yu Cong Yi" Jian 40: "Therefore, it will also contain the things of the ancient and the present." "Shangbo Bamboo Book II. "Rong Chengshi" Jane 9: "Able to be (in) between heaven and earth, and 㯱 (package) is (in) within the four seas." "Shangbo Bamboo Book II. "Rong Chengshi" Jane 19: "The benefit of the world" "Shangbo Bamboo Book II. "Rong Chengshi" Jane 52: "Yi Shao (Xiao) Hui Zhe (Zhu) Hou Zhi (teacher) in Muzhiye (Wild)". "Shangbo Bamboo Book Five. "Three Virtues" Jian 17: "When the wisdom (knowledge) is enough to flow (shun), the wisdom (knowledge) is enough to (educate) talents, and the wisdom (knowledge) is enough to become new (to be pro)." Tsinghua Jane II. "Lian Year" Jane 39: "Qin and Jin Yan will be good, work hard together." "Tsinghua Jane II. "The Year" Jane 61: "The Chuzhuang king was established for ten and four years, and the king met the princes in Li."
